column2: Grants you a bundle item that has several firework options and a one-time grand dragon firework that grants a 50%% magic find boost to all nearby allies.

Greet the Day with a New You!
This kit contains a single Total Makeover Kit and a single Name Change Contract. Use these items to recustomize your character.
Assist the Durmand Priory near Refuge Sanctum.

Summon a rocket-powered golem to land on your downed foes and finish them off.   

This works in WvW and PvP.
This is a permanent account unlock.
Can be worn at night. This item occupies the head slot of your town clothes. Town clothes cannot be worn while in combat.
Allows you to summon a Black Lion Delivery Agent anywhere. This agent allows you to pick up trading-post profits. The agent is usable by anyone and remains in the world for 15 minutes.

Allows you to summon a Black Lion Merchant anywhere. This merchant has some basic items for sale and will buy any items you have. The merchant is usable by anyone and remains in the world for 15 minutes.
